theWildCard:AttackCommonBalancedThrust.NAME: Balanced Thrust
theWildCard:AttackCommonBalancedThrust.DESCRIPTION: Arcana Fool. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

theWildCard:AttackCommonWardingBlow.NAME: Warding Blow
theWildCard:AttackCommonWardingBlow.DESCRIPTION: Arcana Emperor. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

theWildCard:AttackCommonSweepingSlash.NAME: Sweeping Slash
theWildCard:AttackCommonSweepingSlash.DESCRIPTION: Arcana Judgement. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

theWildCard:AttackCommonHealersStrike.NAME: Healer's Strike
theWildCard:AttackCommonHealersStrike.DESCRIPTION: Arcana Priestess. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

theWildCard:PersonaArsene.NAME: Arsene
theWildCard:PersonaArsene.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Persona Fool. NL Gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity.
theWildCard:PersonaArsene.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Retain. NL Persona Fool. NL Gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity.

theWildCard:PersonaMichael.NAME: Michael
theWildCard:PersonaMichael.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Persona Judgement. NL Gain 2 Strength.
theWildCard:PersonaMichael.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Retain. NL Persona Judgement. NL Gain 2 Strength.

theWildCard:PersonaPaleRider.NAME: Pale Rider
theWildCard:PersonaPaleRider.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Persona Death. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable to all enemies. NL At the start of your turn, apply 2 Vulnerable to all enemies.
theWildCard:PersonaPaleRider.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Retain. NL Persona Death. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable to all enemies. NL At the start of your turn, apply 2 Vulnerable to all enemies.

theWildCard:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theWildCard:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theWildCard:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theWildCard:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theWildCard:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theWildCard:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theWildCard:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theWildCard:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theWildCard:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theWildCard:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theWildCard:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theWildCard:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !theWildCard:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
